body:
Martin Moeck wrote:
> 	I use vmware on my laptop (1.7GHz, 512MB RAM) and on the 3GHz office PC.


Thanks for the tip! Wow I'll have to look more into this, for the 
CAD/3D/BIM program I use in Windows-only, but I use a couple of things 
on the Linux side too. Being able to run both at the same time would 
be very keen.


Thanks!


Jeffrey
